languages.text: "Иногда нужно расслабляться, Соломон. Когда нервы постоянно на пределе — и не то померещится".

traits.locale_text: "Иногда нужно расслабляться, Соломон. Когда нервы постоянно на пределе — и не то померещится".

languages.text: "Everyone needs rest sometimes, Solomorne. When one is constantly on edge, one starts to imagine things."
languages.original_text: "Иногда нужно расслабляться, Соломон. Когда нервы постоянно на пределе — и не то померещится".

traits.locale_text: "Everyone must rest sometimes, Solomorne. When one is constantly on edge, one starts imagining things."
"People relax sometimes, Solomorne. They may leave their post every once in a while."
"Everyone needs rest sometimes, Solomorne. When one is constantly on edge, one starts to imagine things."
"Everyone needs rest sometimes, Solomorne. When one is constantly on edge, one starts to imagine things."
"Everyone needs rest sometimes, Solomorne. When one is constantly on edge, one starts to imagine things."
"Everyone needs rest sometimes, Solomorne. When one is constantly on edge, one starts to imagine things."
"Everyone must rest sometimes, Solomorne. When one is constantly on edge, one starts imagining things."

languages.text: "Jeder braucht mal eine Pause, Solomorne. Wenn man ständig angespannt ist, fängt man an, sich Dinge einzubilden."
languages.original_text: "Everyone needs rest sometimes, Solomorne. When one is constantly on edge, one starts to imagine things."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder braucht mal eine Pause, Solomorne. Wenn man ständig angespannt ist, fängt man an, sich Dinge einzubilden."

languages.text: « Tout le monde a besoin de se reposer, Solomorne. Quand on reste constamment sur le qui-vive, on commence parfois à s'imaginer des choses. »
languages.original_text: "Everyone needs rest sometimes, Solomorne. When one is constantly on edge, one starts to imagine things."

traits.locale_text: « Tout le monde a besoin de se reposer, Solomorne. Quand on reste constamment sur le qui-vive, on commence parfois à s'imaginer des choses. »

languages.text: 「ソロモーン、誰にだって休息は必要だ。常に神経を張り詰めていたら、幻覚を見始めてしまうからね」
languages.original_text: "Everyone needs rest sometimes, Solomorne. When one is constantly on edge, one starts to imagine things."

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーン、誰にだって休息は必要だ。常に神経を張り詰めていたら、幻覚を見始めてしまうからね」

languages.text: «Todo el mundo necesita descansar ocasionalmente, Solomorne. La tensión constante hace que la gente acabe imaginándose cosas».
languages.original_text: "Everyone needs rest sometimes, Solomorne. When one is constantly on edge, one starts to imagine things."

traits.locale_text: «Todo el mundo necesita descansar ocasionalmente, Solomorne. La tensión constante hace que la gente acabe imaginándose cosas».

languages.text: “每个人都需要休息，索罗蒙。如果一直处于紧张状态，人就容易开始胡思乱想。”
languages.original_text: "Everyone needs rest sometimes, Solomorne. When one is constantly on edge, one starts to imagine things."

traits.locale_text: “每个人都需要休息，索罗蒙。如果一直处于紧张状态，人就容易开始胡思乱想。”

languages.text: "Herkes bazen dinlenmek ister Solomorne. Yorgunluktan ölürken bir şeyleri kurup onlara inanmamak elde olmaz."
languages.original_text: "Everyone needs rest sometimes, Solomorne. When one is constantly on edge, one starts to imagine things."

traits.locale_text: "Herkes bazen dinlenmek ister Solomorne. Yorgunluktan ölürken bir şeyleri kurup onlara inanmamak elde olmaz."
